item.description:
Time for another north shore ride (40 miles with scenic breaks) on Sunday.

Route Summary:
40 mile ride,

starting out in Manchester By The Sea MBTA station.

We will head out to Cape Ann and pass thru Gloucester and Rockport. There are several scenic stopping points so having walkable bike shoes is a good idea. Also, bring layers, and you might need full finger gloves (coastal wind can be cold on hands)

The length of this ride puts this in the intermediate category.

The route   http://goo.gl/maps/QKXGs

Riders should plan to meet at 9:30 am and be ready to ride @ 9:45 am.

We should return to the parking area around 3:30 pm. Please be able to keep 12 - 15 pace. Please be able to keep the pace b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point
MBTA station, Manchester by the Sea

**Park in rear of lot  (MBTA Commuter area) ** 

Do NOT park near shops -  tow risk

 

40 Beach St Manchester, MA 01944

Midway point

Rockport, MA (beakskin neck area)

http://www.beanandleafcafe.net/

What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair, cool weather riding gear, water and snacks.  


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Bike shoes, Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.

 

Cue"gle" cue sheet

 http://files.meetup.com/482869/capeann40.txt
item.how_to_find_us: MBTA Parking is in the very back area past Plaza with Dunkin Donuts
item.name: Manchester by the Sea to Cape Ann - 40 miles
